statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy;
SELECT pricing_id, base_price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT competition_factor, demand_factor FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE base_price > 50 AND competition_factor < 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM pricing_strategy;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE pricing_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, base_price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE demand_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT pricing_id, base_price, competition_factor FROM pricing_strategy WHERE base_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE demand_factor < 0.3 ORDER BY pricing_id ASC, base_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, demand_factor FROM pricing_strategy WHERE base_price >= 75 AND competition_factor < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE demand_level = 3 AND competition_level = 2
SELECT product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE competition_level = 1 AND demand_level = 4
SELECT id, product_name FROM pricing_strategies
SELECT product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE demand_level > 5 AND competition_level < 3
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE price >= 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT p.product_name, h.price, h.date FROM pricing_strategies p INNER JOIN pricing_history h ON p.id = h.pricing_strategy_id ORDER BY h.date DESC
SELECT product_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM pricing_strategies GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, demand_level FROM pricing_strategies WHERE demand_level > 3;
SELECT strategy_name, base_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE base_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM demand_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, competition_level, base_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE competition_level > 2 ORDER BY base_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Premium';
SELECT strategy_name, base_price FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_data WHERE strategy_id = 3 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY demand_value DESC;

SELECT strategy_name, competitor_name, competitor_price FROM pricing_strategies ps INNER JOIN competition_data cd ON ps.strategy_id = cd.strategy_id WHERE ps.demand_level > 3 AND cd.competitor_price < ps.base_price;
SELECT AVG(base_price) AS avg_base_price, MIN(demand_level) AS min_demand_level, MAX(competition_level) AS max_competition_level FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT pricing_strategy_name, base_price FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT demand_date, demand_quantity FROM demand_data WHERE demand_quantity > 1000;
SELECT product_name, competitor_name, price FROM competition_data JOIN products ON competition_data.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT pricing_strategy_id, pricing_strategy_name, base_price FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY pricing_strategy_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, d.demand_quantity FROM products p JOIN demand_data d ON p.product_id = d.product_id WHERE d.demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT c.competition_id, c.competitor_name, c.price, p.product_name FROM competition_data c JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY c.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy;
SELECT strategy_name, min_price, max_price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE min_price > 50;
SELECT competition_name, competition_level FROM competition_analysis ORDER BY competition_level DESC;
SELECT demand_name, demand_level FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_level BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT history_id, price, date_of_change FROM pricing_history ORDER BY date_of_change ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, min_price, max_price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE min_price > 50 ORDER BY max_price DESC;
SELECT competition_name, competition_level, competition_date FROM competition_analysis WHERE competition_level < 3 ORDER BY competition_date ASC;
SELECT demand_name, demand_level, demand_date FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_level = 2 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM demand_date) = 10;

SELECT recommendation_id, strategy_id, recommended_price, recommendation_date FROM pricing_recommendation WHERE recommended_price BETWEEN 80 AND 100 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC, recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT p.strategy_name, pr.price, pr.date_of_change FROM pricing_strategy p JOIN pricing_history pr ON p.strategy_id = pr.strategy_id WHERE pr.date_of_change BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
